alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains; Far Northwest Highlands; Jemez Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 4:54AM MST until December 25 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of generally 2 to 5 inches with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Far Northwest Highlands, Jemez Mountains and Chuska Mountains. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire traction will be reduced. Extend the distance between your vehicle and the vehicle in front of you. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Chuska Mountains; Far Northwest Highlands; Jemez Mountains
